title: Printed treasures of the New York Public Library
content: Today's Gothamist has [a great post about the NYPL's Rare Books Division](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165221/http:/gothamist.com/2009/08/10/rare_books_collection.php), with plenty of drool-worthy images.
author: Ricardo Cordoba

comments.content: Drool-worthy indeed. Thanks for the pointer!
